Package Hexxagon.Model

Classes and interfaces found in this package are designed to implement the model layer of Hexxagon module.

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    IField
    Describes methods of object represents a cell on game board.
    IGameData
    Contains method specifications of Data Access Object of Hexxagon module.
    IGamePlay
    Contains method specifications of data component of Hexxagon module.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    GameData
    It is the Data Access Object of the Hexxagon module.
    GamePlay
    It stores the actual state of the game board
    GamePlay.Field
    A game play consists of stands and other data.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    IGameData.ProcessStatusCode
    Statuses of game.
    IGamePlay.StatusCode
    Stores statuses of actual game play.

Package Hexxagon.Model Description

Classes and interfaces found in this package are designed to implement the model layer of Hexxagon module.
